entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE

HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
